column4: hi, I'm running feisty/amd64.  I want to install a Sun java6 plugin for firefox, but couldn't find one.  Searched google and found reference to sun-java6-plugin, but I don't have this pkg in my cache.  Any suggestions?
there is no 64-bit java plugin for firefox. You can install a 32-bit chroot environment
!chroot > rothfuss, please read ubotu's private message.
